alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Lawrence County through 400 PM EDT... At 315 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Edwardsville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ogdensburg, De Kalb, Rensselaer Falls, Edwardsville, Heuvelton, Morristown, Hammond, Richville, De Peyster, Jacques Cartier State Park and East De Kalb. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
